Posts.Content: Hi Youngatheart treatment is going well, thanks. Halfway through as of today! :-) Only got a slightly pinker boob so far, but am really tired. I’m a space cadet for around an hour after zapping, then pick up. I can still get a good 5k walk in of an afternoon (but would prefer to sleep!) have you started now, I can’t find the post with your start date on, sorry.  xx
Posts.Title: October 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Content: Those tattoos are a nightmare huh?! The one on my right side (the first one inflicted!!) hurt so much, the others weren’t as bad. Don’t know what the lovely lady did to me, but it ended up with no ink & I had to have it redone! Nowhere near so painful. I do wonder whether the pain is user technique related.  Good luck! X
Posts.Title: October 2018 Radiotherapy Club

Posts.Content: Well, I could terrify the Trick or Treaters with my burnt Frankenboob!

Posts.Content: Glad you’re getting on ok  xx
